snippet: After the president of Argentina, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, did not receive an invitation to the ceremonial funeral for Margaret Thatcher in London next week, Argentina called it “yet another provocation.”
abstract: Great Britain does not invite Argentinian Pres Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner to funeral of former British Prime Min Margaret Thatcher, further straining relationship between nations locked in rivalry over claims to Falkland Islands; Argentina calls oversight 'yet another provocation'.

byline.contributor: Jonathan Gilbert contributed reporting from Buenos Aires.

lead_paragraph: After the president of Argentina, Cristina Fernández de Kirchner, did not receive an invitation to the ceremonial funeral for Margaret Thatcher in London next week, Argentina called it “yet another provocation.”

headline.seo: Argentine President Is Not Invited to Thatcher Funeral
headline.main: Islands, and Now a Funeral, Strain Argentine-British Ties
headline.print_headline: Islands, and Now a Funeral, Strain Argentine-British Ties
